name: Hungry Fish Evolution
description: A colorful mixture of RPG, arcade and runner, about the survival of your fish that you will love)
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 1.4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 1.4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 80 MB available space
